column2: Description
find the coffeemachine, press starting button on a coffeemachine
find dirty plates, put the dirty plates in sinkbasin, then use dishsponge to wash it
find an apple, find a knife. Cut the apple with the knife.
find a piece of bread, put that in a toaster, press starting button
find an egg, break that egg and put it onto the pan. Turn on gasburner, then put the pan on the gasburner.
find a tomato, put that tomato into the pot. Put the pot under the faucet, and turn on the faucet until filling the pot. Turn on the gasburner, then put the pot on the gasburner.
find a piece of lettuce, put that lettuce into the pot. Put the pot under the faucet, and turn on the faucet until filling the pot. Turn on the gasburner, then put the pot on the gasburner.
Find the pot. Put the pot under the faucet, and turn on the faucet until filling the pot. Turn on the gasburner, then put the pot on the gasburner.
Find an egg check if it is cracked. If it is, throw the egg into the bin.
Open the fridge. Throw everything in that fridge into the bin.
Firstly, find the potato. Then, find the knife. Slice the potato with the knife. Finally, microwave the slices of potato.
Firstly, find the wine. Find the cup. Then, pour the wine into the cup.
Firstly, find the food that needs to be stored. Locate and open the fridge. Then, store the food in the fridge.
Firstly, locate the cup. Secondly, turn on the kitchen sink faucet. Thirdly, fill the cup with water.

Firstly, locate the potato. Secondly, turn on the stoveknobrange. Thirdly, locate a pot. Fourthly, turn on the sink faucet. Fifthly, fill the pot with water. Put the pot on the stoveknobrange when the stoveknobrange is hot. Put the potatoes in the pot and boil them.
Firstly, locate the unused apple slices. Throw the unused apple slices in the bin.
Firstly, locate the spatula, spoon, knife, and fork. Put the spatula, spoon, knife, and fork in the drawer.

column1: Pour away coffee in a cup_15_1
column2: Firstly, find the coffee. Find the cup. Pour the coffee into the cup.
Firstly, find the pot filled with water. Pour the water that's in the pot into the sink.
Firstly, find the kitchen light. Turn it off.
Open laptop,push power button,begin using laptop.
Walk to the television. Push the power button, select the channel.

column1: Check the timing on the watch_219_1
column2: Pick up watch, look at the face and read the time.
Open box, pick up item put into box, close box.
Pick up tissue walk to the bin and place in the bin.

column1: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_219_1
column2: Walk to the desk lamp, locate the switch and turn until lamp goes off.
Pick up the hand phone and drop it
Pick up the phone and on it.
Take everything off the sofas surface and put it somewhere else.
Locate book, walk to sofa, sit down, open book
